definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party

sentences.english: So, you can make 2N different types of milkshakes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你一共可以做2N中不同口味的奶昔。

sentences.english: We have five classes; therefore, we need five maps.
sentences.chinese: 我們一共有五個班，需要五張地圖。

sentences.english: All told, there were seven major revisions.
sentences.chinese: 總之，一共有七次重大修改。

sentences.english: There were twelve fairies, and they were all sent invitations.
sentences.chinese: 一共有十二位仙女，她們都收到了邀請。

sentences.english: Mather gave his flock no fewer than four such dates, beginning with the year 1697.
sentences.chinese: 他一共提出了四個日期，第一個是1697年。

sentences.english: Twelve trials with a total of 724 participants were included in the review.
sentences.chinese: 一共納入十二組試驗的724位參與者。

sentences.english: How many Elemental Dragons guide and rule Ashan?
sentences.chinese: 一共有多少條元素龍統治和操縱着亞山年夜陸？

sentences.english: It's 120 yuan . Would you like to pay in cash or bill it to your room?
sentences.chinese: 一共是120元。請問怎樣付款，付現金還是入房帳？

sentences.english: Yes, Remi's dream-seeking adventure takes only two months.
sentences.chinese: 的確，小米的全部尋夢之旅一共也只有兩個月。

sentences.english: This book is in six volumes.
It comes to 3645 RMB at today's exchange rate. Here is your money.
sentences.chinese: 根據今天的兌換率，一共是3645元人民幣，給您。

sentences.english: He served twenty aces all together in this match.
sentences.chinese: 他在這場比賽中一共發了20個ACE球。

sentences.english: I had five classes all day.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們一共有五節課。

sentences.english: Unit 1 There are 46 students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 第一單元我們班上一共有46名學生。

sentences.english: It took Kurita over three hours to round up his force.
sentences.chinese: 慄田集合他的艦隻，一共花了三個多小時。

sentences.english: Over the intervening 109 years, more than 500 prizes have been awarded.
sentences.chinese: 在此的109年間，一共頒發了500多個諾貝爾獎。

definition: up to/no less than/as much as
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
